name: get the carrot
description:
[Update 3/13/22]  There are a few known bugs in this game which may be patched in future. Most notably, if you have trouble clearing the game, reload & try eating all the apples & THEN the carrot. Thank you!

He's just a hungry little guy! Collect the carrot.

This is just a quick 1 minute web browser game to show what I've learnt in my first week using blender & unity! My biggest challenge in this project was making the player face the direction of movement. I was able to solve the problem but didn't include that function here, due to RigidBody enablers & no CharacterController. 

Controls:

Arrows = player movement

X & C = left & right camera rotation

Spacebar = jump & double jump

Secret colours = RGBY & P

SFX:  lofi world vol 17
